answers.answer: Yes! I am having this right now, in my left foot actually. I worry that it may be diabetes or something like that. I've had it before as well. Its just recently come back within the past few days. Grr! I am tired of worrying.
yes, i know what you mean, i'v had this feeling in my feet for 2years. i also thought it was ms or diabetes. i wish someone had the answer for it.i'm also tired of worrying it does alot to your body.

Ever since i had 2 massive panic attacks in may my axiety has been really bad. one of the newer syptoms ive gotten lately was that constant buzzings feeling. i ususally have it in my left arm and left leg. i also would worry it was ms, parkinsons, or diabetes. if i thought about it too much or paid much attention to the fact im tingaling it would make it spread to other parts of my body. its so weird how powerful your mind is.

i know exactly what you mean, I have had pretty bad anxiety for the past few months now..and I also get this weird buzzing/vibrating sensation in my left foot, it gets worse when im thinking about it. I too was terrified that i had ms or something. but I have had lots of little neuro tests, been for a brain mri and had tons of bloodwork....everything has come out normal...the doctors have just told me that is just another one of the manyyyyyyy symptoms that anxiety can create.goodluck :)

question: Does anyone get a buzzing feeling in there feet?I'v had a mri and blood work and everything came back normal.
title: buzzing feeling
